data.name: We Are OFK - Original Score by Omniboi
data.detailed_description:
FULL SCORE UNLOCKS SEPTEMBER 8!

The full Omniboi Score Album is included in your purchase! A 2-track sneak peak will download immediately, and the rest of the score will automatically be released to you on September 8th, for the We Are OFK Season Finale!

From Pop Chip Musician, Omniboi

Selected tracks, specially recut and mastered for this Omniboi album, a jazz and soul-influenced pop chip emotional journey through the characters and relationships of We Are OFK's score/soundtrack. Plus an original experimental concerto from composer Nicole Brady & Wldr Ensemble.


THE REMAINDER OF THE SCORE WILL BECOME AVAILABLE ON SEPTEMBER 8
Alongside the We Are OFK series finale
